message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $110. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend closer to $105. Would you be willing to go that low?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $105, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, after all!
